title: [By Jupiter]
creator_credit: Wilding Picture Productions and Jack Tilles
brief_description: The film approaches the universal problem of improving the attitude of man to man. Shows how the attitude of a person reacts upon the people whom he meets in his way to work - first, when he is angry and, secondly, when he uses consideration to accomplish his ends.
